4041 // Load default internal buffers
4042 static void LoadBuffersDefault(void)
4043 {
4044  // Initialize CPU (RAM) arrays (vertex position, texcoord, color data and indexes)
4045  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4046  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING; i++)
4047  {
4048  vertexData[i].vertices = (float *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(float)*3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 3 float by vertex, 4 vertex by quad
4049  vertexData[i].texcoords = (float *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(float)*2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 2 float by texcoord, 4 texcoord by quad
4050  vertexData[i].colors = (unsigned char *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(unsigned char)*4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 4 float by color, 4 colors by quad
4051 #if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
4052  vertexData[i].indices = (unsigned int *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(unsigned int)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 6 int by quad (indices)
4053 #elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
4054  vertexData[i].indices = (unsigned short *)RL_MALLOC(sizeof(unsigned short)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); // 6 int by quad (indices)
4055 #endif
4056 
4057  for (int j = 0; j < (3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j++) vertexData[i].vertices[j] = 0.0f;
4058  for (int j = 0; j < (2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j++) vertexData[i].texcoords[j] = 0.0f;
4059  for (int j = 0; j < (4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j++) vertexData[i].colors[j] = 0;
4060 
4061  int k = 0;
4062 
4063  // Indices can be initialized right now
4064  for (int j = 0; j < (6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS); j += 6)
4065  {
4066  vertexData[i].indices[j] = 4*k;
4067  vertexData[i].indices[j + 1] = 4*k + 1;
4068  vertexData[i].indices[j + 2] = 4*k + 2;
4069  vertexData[i].indices[j + 3] = 4*k;
4070  vertexData[i].indices[j + 4] = 4*k + 2;
4071  vertexData[i].indices[j + 5] = 4*k + 3;
4072 
4073  k++;
4074  }
4075 
4076  vertexData[i].vCounter = 0;
4077  vertexData[i].tcCounter = 0;
4078  vertexData[i].cCounter = 0;
4079  }
4080 
4081  TraceLog(LOG_INFO, "Internal buffers initialized successfully (CPU)");
4082  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4083 
4084  // Upload to GPU (VRAM) vertex data and initialize VAOs/VBOs
4085  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4086  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING; i++)
4087  {
4088  if (vaoSupported)
4089  {
4090  // Initialize Quads VAO
4091  glGenVertexArrays(1, &vertexData[i].vaoId);
4092  glBindVertexArray(vertexData[i].vaoId);
4093  }
4094 
4095  // Quads - Vertex buffers binding and attributes enable
4096  // Vertex position buffer (shader-location = 0)
4097  glGenBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[0]);
4098  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[i].vboId[0]);
4099  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[i].vertices, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
4100  glEnableVertexAttribArray(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION]);
4101  glVertexAttribPointer(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION], 3, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4102 
4103  // Vertex texcoord buffer (shader-location = 1)
4104  glGenBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[1]);
4105  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[i].vboId[1]);
4106  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[i].texcoords, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
4107  glEnableVertexAttribArray(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01]);
4108  glVertexAttribPointer(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01], 2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4109 
4110  // Vertex color buffer (shader-location = 3)
4111  glGenBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[2]);
4112  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[i].vboId[2]);
4113  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(unsigned char)*4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[i].colors, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
4114  glEnableVertexAttribArray(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR]);
4115  glVertexAttribPointer(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR], 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, 0, 0);
4116 
4117  // Fill index buffer
4118  glGenBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[3]);
4119  glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[i].vboId[3]);
4120 #if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
4121  glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(int)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[i].indices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4122 #elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
4123  glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(short)*6*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[i].indices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4124 #endif
4125  }
4126 
4127  TraceLog(LOG_INFO, "Internal buffers uploaded successfully (GPU)");
4128 
4129  // Unbind the current VAO
4130  if (vaoSupported) glBindVertexArray(0);
4131  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4132 }
4133 
4134 // Update default internal buffers (VAOs/VBOs) with vertex array data
4135 // NOTE: If there is not vertex data, buffers doesn't need to be updated (vertexCount > 0)
4136 // TODO: If no data changed on the CPU arrays --> No need to re-update GPU arrays (change flag required)
4137 static void UpdateBuffersDefault(void)
4138 {
4139  // Update vertex buffers data
4140  if (vertexData[currentBuffer].vCounter > 0)
4141  {
4142  // Activate elements VAO
4143  if (vaoSupported) glBindVertexArray(vertexData[currentBuffer].vaoId);
4144 
4145  // Vertex positions buffer
4146  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[0]);
4147  glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(float)*3*vertexData[currentBuffer].vCounter, vertexData[currentBuffer].vertices);
4148  //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*3*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[currentBuffer].vertices, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW); // Update all buffer
4149 
4150  // Texture coordinates buffer
4151  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[1]);
4152  glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(float)*2*vertexData[currentBuffer].vCounter, vertexData[currentBuffer].texcoords);
4153  //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*2*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[currentBuffer].texcoords, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW); // Update all buffer
4154 
4155  // Colors buffer
4156  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[2]);
4157  glBufferSubData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(unsigned char)*4*vertexData[currentBuffer].vCounter, vertexData[currentBuffer].colors);
4158  //glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float)*4*4*MAX_BATCH_ELEMENTS, vertexData[currentBuffer].colors, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW); // Update all buffer
4159 
4160  // NOTE: glMapBuffer() causes sync issue.
4161  // If GPU is working with this buffer, glMapBuffer() will wait(stall) until GPU to finish its job.
4162  // To avoid waiting (idle), you can call first glBufferData() with NULL pointer before glMapBuffer().
4163  // If you do that, the previous data in PBO will be discarded and glMapBuffer() returns a new
4164  // allocated pointer immediately even if GPU is still working with the previous data.
4165 
4166  // Another option: map the buffer object into client's memory
4167  // Probably this code could be moved somewhere else...
4168  // vertexData[currentBuffer].vertices = (float *)glMapBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, GL_READ_WRITE);
4169  // if (vertexData[currentBuffer].vertices)
4170  // {
4171  // Update vertex data
4172  // }
4173  // glUnmapBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER);
4174 
4175  // Unbind the current VAO
4176  if (vaoSupported) glBindVertexArray(0);
4177  }
4178 }
4179 
4180 // Draw default internal buffers vertex data
4181 static void DrawBuffersDefault(void)
4182 {
4183  Matrix matProjection = projection;
4184  Matrix matModelView = modelview;
4185 
4186  int eyesCount = 1;
4187 #if defined(SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR)
4188  if (vrStereoRender) eyesCount = 2;
4189 #endif
4190 
4191  for (int eye = 0; eye < eyesCount; eye++)
4192  {
4193 #if defined(SUPPORT_VR_SIMULATOR)
4194  if (eyesCount == 2) SetStereoView(eye, matProjection, matModelView);
4195 #endif
4196 
4197  // Draw buffers
4198  if (vertexData[currentBuffer].vCounter > 0)
4199  {
4200  // Set current shader and upload current MVP matrix
4201  glUseProgram(currentShader.id);
4202 
4203  // Create modelview-projection matrix
4204  Matrix matMVP = MatrixMultiply(modelview, projection);
4205 
4206  glUniformMatrix4fv(currentShader.locs[LOC_MATRIX_MVP], 1, false, MatrixToFloat(matMVP));
4207  glUniform4f(currentShader.locs[LOC_COLOR_DIFFUSE], 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
4208  glUniform1i(currentShader.locs[LOC_MAP_DIFFUSE], 0); // Provided value refers to the texture unit (active)
4209 
4210  // TODO: Support additional texture units on custom shader
4211  //if (currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] > 0) glUniform1i(currentShader.locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR], 1);
4212  //if (currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_NORMAL] > 0) glUniform1i(currentShader.locs[LOC_MAP_NORMAL], 2);
4213 
4214  // NOTE: Right now additional map textures not considered for default buffers drawing
4215 
4216  int vertexOffset = 0;
4217 
4218  if (vaoSupported) glBindVertexArray(vertexData[currentBuffer].vaoId);
4219  else
4220  {
4221  // Bind vertex attrib: position (shader-location = 0)
4222  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[0]);
4223  glVertexAttribPointer(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION], 3, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4224  glEnableVertexAttribArray(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_POSITION]);
4225 
4226  // Bind vertex attrib: texcoord (shader-location = 1)
4227  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[1]);
4228  glVertexAttribPointer(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01], 2, GL_FLOAT, 0, 0, 0);
4229  glEnableVertexAttribArray(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_TEXCOORD01]);
4230 
4231  // Bind vertex attrib: color (shader-location = 3)
4232  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[2]);
4233  glVertexAttribPointer(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR], 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, 0, 0);
4234  glEnableVertexAttribArray(currentShader.locs[LOC_VERTEX_COLOR]);
4235 
4236  glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexData[currentBuffer].vboId[3]);
4237  }
4238 
4239  glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
4240 
4241  for (int i = 0; i < drawsCounter; i++)
4242  {
4243  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, draws[i].textureId);
4244 
4245  // TODO: Find some way to bind additional textures --> Use global texture IDs? Register them on draw[i]?
4246  //if (currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] > 0) { glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE1); glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureUnit1_id); }
4247  //if (currentShader->locs[LOC_MAP_SPECULAR] > 0) { glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE2); glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureUnit2_id); }
4248 
4249  if ((draws[i].mode == RL_LINES) || (draws[i].mode == RL_TRIANGLES)) glDrawArrays(draws[i].mode, vertexOffset, draws[i].vertexCount);
4250  else
4251  {
4252 #if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_33)
4253  // We need to define the number of indices to be processed: quadsCount*6
4254  // NOTE: The final parameter tells the GPU the offset in bytes from the
4255  // start of the index buffer to the location of the first index to process
4256  glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, draws[i].vertexCount/4*6, GL_UNSIGNED_INT, (GLvoid *)(sizeof(GLuint)*vertexOffset/4*6));
4257 #elif defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_ES2)
4258  glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, draws[i].vertexCount/4*6, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, (GLvoid *)(sizeof(GLushort)*vertexOffset/4*6));
4259 #endif
4260  }
4261 
4262  vertexOffset += (draws[i].vertexCount + draws[i].vertexAlignment);
4263  }
4264 
4265  if (!vaoSupported)
4266  {
4267  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4268  glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4269  }
4270 
4271  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0); // Unbind textures
4272  }
4273 
4274  if (vaoSupported) glBindVertexArray(0); // Unbind VAO
4275 
4276  glUseProgram(0); // Unbind shader program
4277  }
4278 
4279  // Reset vertex counters for next frame
4280  vertexData[currentBuffer].vCounter = 0;
4281  vertexData[currentBuffer].tcCounter = 0;
4282  vertexData[currentBuffer].cCounter = 0;
4283 
4284  // Reset depth for next draw
4285  currentDepth = -1.0f;
4286 
4287  // Restore projection/modelview matrices
4288  projection = matProjection;
4289  modelview = matModelView;
4290 
4291  // Reset draws array
4292  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_DRAWCALL_REGISTERED; i++)
4293  {
4294  draws[i].mode = RL_QUADS;
4295  draws[i].vertexCount = 0;
4296  draws[i].textureId = defaultTextureId;
4297  }
4298 
4299  drawsCounter = 1;
4300 
4301  // Change to next buffer in the list
4302  currentBuffer++;
4303  if (currentBuffer >= MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING) currentBuffer = 0;
4304 }
4305 
4306 // Unload default internal buffers vertex data from CPU and GPU
4307 static void UnloadBuffersDefault(void)
4308 {
4309  // Unbind everything
4310  if (vaoSupported) glBindVertexArray(0);
4311  glDisableVertexAttribArray(0);
4312  glDisableVertexAttribArray(1);
4313  glDisableVertexAttribArray(2);
4314  glDisableVertexAttribArray(3);
4315  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4316  glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
4317 
4318  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_BATCH_BUFFERING; i++)
4319  {
4320  // Delete VBOs from GPU (VRAM)
4321  glDeleteBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[0]);
4322  glDeleteBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[1]);
4323  glDeleteBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[2]);
4324  glDeleteBuffers(1, &vertexData[i].vboId[3]);
4325 
4326  // Delete VAOs from GPU (VRAM)
4327  if (vaoSupported) glDeleteVertexArrays(1, &vertexData[i].vaoId);
4328 
4329  // Free vertex arrays memory from CPU (RAM)
4330  RL_FREE(vertexData[i].vertices);
4331  RL_FREE(vertexData[i].texcoords);
4332  RL_FREE(vertexData[i].colors);
4333  RL_FREE(vertexData[i].indices);
4334  }
4335 }

4337 // Renders a 1x1 XY quad in NDC
4338 static void GenDrawQuad(void)
4339 {
4340  unsigned int quadVAO = 0;
4341  unsigned int quadVBO = 0;
4342 
4343  float vertices[] = {
4344  // Positions // Texture Coords
4345  -1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f,
4346  -1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f,
4347  1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f,
4348  1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f,
4349  };
4350 
4351  // Set up plane VAO
4352  glGenVertexArrays(1, &quadVAO);
4353  glGenBuffers(1, &quadVBO);
4354  glBindVertexArray(quadVAO);
4355 
4356  // Fill buffer
4357  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, quadVBO);
4358  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(vertices), &vertices, GL_STATIC_DRAW);
4359 
4360  // Link vertex attributes
4361  glEnableVertexAttribArray(0);
4362  glVertexAttribPointer(0, 3, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 5*sizeof(float), (void *)0);
4363  glEnableVertexAttribArray(1);
4364  glVertexAttribPointer(1, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, 5*sizeof(float), (void *)(3*sizeof(float)));
4365 
4366  // Draw quad
4367  glBindVertexArray(quadVAO);
4368  glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4);
4369  glBindVertexArray(0);
4370 
4371  glDeleteBuffers(1, &quadVBO);
4372  glDeleteVertexArrays(1, &quadVAO);
4373 }

4449 // Set internal projection and modelview matrix depending on eyes tracking data
4450 static void SetStereoView(int eye, Matrix matProjection, Matrix matModelView)
4451 {
4452  Matrix eyeProjection = matProjection;
4453  Matrix eyeModelView = matModelView;
4454 
4455  // Setup viewport and projection/modelview matrices using tracking data
4456  rlViewport(eye*framebufferWidth/2, 0, framebufferWidth/2, framebufferHeight);
4457 
4458  // Apply view offset to modelview matrix
4459  eyeModelView = MatrixMultiply(matModelView, vrConfig.eyesViewOffset[eye]);
4460 
4461  // Set current eye projection matrix
4462  eyeProjection = vrConfig.eyesProjection[eye];
4463 
4464  SetMatrixModelview(eyeModelView);
4465  SetMatrixProjection(eyeProjection);
4466 }

4471 #if defined(GRAPHICS_API_OPENGL_11)
4472 // Mipmaps data is generated after image data
4473 // NOTE: Only works with RGBA (4 bytes) data!
4474 static int GenerateMipmaps(unsigned char *data, int baseWidth, int baseHeight)
4475 {
4476  int mipmapCount = 1; // Required mipmap levels count (including base level)
4477  int width = baseWidth;
4478  int height = baseHeight;
4479  int size = baseWidth*baseHeight*4; // Size in bytes (will include mipmaps...), RGBA only
4480 
4481  // Count mipmap levels required
4482  while ((width != 1) && (height != 1))
4483  {
4484  if (width != 1) width /= 2;
4485  if (height != 1) height /= 2;
4486 
4487  TraceLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Next mipmap size: %i x %i", width, height);
4488 
4489  mipmapCount++;
4490 
4491  size += (width*height*4); // Add mipmap size (in bytes)
4492  }
4493 
4494  TraceLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Total mipmaps required: %i", mipmapCount);
4495  TraceLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Total size of data required: %i", size);
4496 
4497  unsigned char *temp = RL_REALLOC(data, size);
4498 
4499  if (temp != NULL) data = temp;
4500  else TraceLog(LOG_WARNING, "Mipmaps required memory could not be allocated");
4501 
4502  width = baseWidth;
4503  height = baseHeight;
4504  size = (width*height*4);
4505 
4506  // Generate mipmaps
4507  // NOTE: Every mipmap data is stored after data
4508  Color *image = (Color *)RL_MALLOC(width*height*sizeof(Color));
4509  Color *mipmap = NULL;
4510  int offset = 0;
4511  int j = 0;
4512 
4513  for (int i = 0; i < size; i += 4)
4514  {
4515  image[j].r = data[i];
4516  image[j].g = data[i + 1];
4517  image[j].b = data[i + 2];
4518  image[j].a = data[i + 3];
4519  j++;
4520  }
4521 
4522  TraceLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Mipmap base (%ix%i)", width, height);
4523 
4524  for (int mip = 1; mip < mipmapCount; mip++)
4525  {
4526  mipmap = GenNextMipmap(image, width, height);
4527 
4528  offset += (width*height*4); // Size of last mipmap
4529  j = 0;
4530 
4531  width /= 2;
4532  height /= 2;
4533  size = (width*height*4); // Mipmap size to store after offset
4534 
4535  // Add mipmap to data
4536  for (int i = 0; i < size; i += 4)
4537  {
4538  data[offset + i] = mipmap[j].r;
4539  data[offset + i + 1] = mipmap[j].g;
4540  data[offset + i + 2] = mipmap[j].b;
4541  data[offset + i + 3] = mipmap[j].a;
4542  j++;
4543  }
4544 
4545  RL_FREE(image);
4546 
4547  image = mipmap;
4548  mipmap = NULL;
4549  }
4550 
4551  RL_FREE(mipmap); // free mipmap data
4552 
4553  return mipmapCount;
4554 }
4555 
4556 // Manual mipmap generation (basic scaling algorithm)
4557 static Color *GenNextMipmap(Color *srcData, int srcWidth, int srcHeight)
4558 {
4559  int x2, y2;
4560  Color prow, pcol;
4561 
4562  int width = srcWidth/2;
4563  int height = srcHeight/2;
4564 
4565  Color *mipmap = (Color *)RL_MALLOC(width*height*sizeof(Color));
4566 
4567  // Scaling algorithm works perfectly (box-filter)
4568  for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
4569  {
4570  y2 = 2*y;
4571 
4572  for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
4573  {
4574  x2 = 2*x;
4575 
4576  prow.r = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].r + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].r)/2;
4577  prow.g = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].g + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].g)/2;
4578  prow.b = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].b + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].b)/2;
4579  prow.a = (srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2].a + srcData[y2*srcWidth + x2 + 1].a)/2;
4580 
4581  pcol.r = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].r + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].r)/2;
4582  pcol.g = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].g + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].g)/2;
4583  pcol.b = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].b + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].b)/2;
4584  pcol.a = (srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2].a + srcData[(y2+1)*srcWidth + x2 + 1].a)/2;
4585 
4586  mipmap[y*width + x].r = (prow.r + pcol.r)/2;
4587  mipmap[y*width + x].g = (prow.g + pcol.g)/2;
4588  mipmap[y*width + x].b = (prow.b + pcol.b)/2;
4589  mipmap[y*width + x].a = (prow.a + pcol.a)/2;
4590  }
4591  }
4592 
4593  TraceLog(LOG_DEBUG, "Mipmap generated successfully (%ix%i)", width, height);
4594 
4595  return mipmap;
4596 }
4597 #endif
4598 
4599 #if defined(RLGL_STANDALONE)
4600 // Show trace log messages (LOG_INFO, LOG_WARNING, LOG_ERROR, LOG_DEBUG)
4601 void TraceLog(int msgType, const char *text, ...)
4602 {
4603  va_list args;
4604  va_start(args, text);
4605 
4606  switch (msgType)
4607  {
4608  case LOG_INFO: fprintf(stdout, "INFO: "); break;
4609  case LOG_ERROR: fprintf(stdout, "ERROR: "); break;
4610  case LOG_WARNING: fprintf(stdout, "WARNING: "); break;
4611  case LOG_DEBUG: fprintf(stdout, "DEBUG: "); break;
4612  default: break;
4613  }
4614 
4615  vfprintf(stdout, text, args);
4616  fprintf(stdout, "\n");
4617 
4618  va_end(args);
4619 
4620  if (msgType == LOG_ERROR) exit(1);
4621 }
4622 
4623 // Get pixel data size in bytes (image or texture)
4624 // NOTE: Size depends on pixel format
4625 int GetPixelDataSize(int width, int height, int format)
4626 {
4627  int dataSize = 0; // Size in bytes
4628  int bpp = 0; // Bits per pixel
4629 
4630  switch (format)
4631  {
4632  case UNCOMPRESSED_GRAYSCALE: bpp = 8; break;
4633  case UNCOMPRESSED_GRAY_ALPHA:
4634  case UNCOMPRESSED_R5G6B5:
4635  case UNCOMPRESSED_R5G5B5A1:
4636  case UNCOMPRESSED_R4G4B4A4: bpp = 16; break;
4637  case UNCOMPRESSED_R8G8B8A8: bpp = 32; break;
4638  case UNCOMPRESSED_R8G8B8: bpp = 24; break;
4639  case UNCOMPRESSED_R32: bpp = 32; break;
4640  case UNCOMPRESSED_R32G32B32: bpp = 32*3; break;
4641  case UNCOMPRESSED_R32G32B32A32: bpp = 32*4; break;
4642  case COMPRESSED_DXT1_RGB:
4643  case COMPRESSED_DXT1_RGBA:
4644  case COMPRESSED_ETC1_RGB:
4645  case COMPRESSED_ETC2_RGB:
4646  case COMPRESSED_PVRT_RGB:
4647  case COMPRESSED_PVRT_RGBA: bpp = 4; break;
4648  case COMPRESSED_DXT3_RGBA:
4649  case COMPRESSED_DXT5_RGBA:
4650  case COMPRESSED_ETC2_EAC_RGBA:
4651  case COMPRESSED_ASTC_4x4_RGBA: bpp = 8; break;
4652  case COMPRESSED_ASTC_8x8_RGBA: bpp = 2; break;
4653  default: break;
4654  }
4655 
4656  dataSize = width*height*bpp/8; // Total data size in bytes
4657 
4658  // Most compressed formats works on 4x4 blocks,
4659  // if texture is smaller, minimum dataSize is 8 or 16
4660  if ((width < 4) && (height < 4))
4661  {
4662  if ((format >= COMPRESSED_DXT1_RGB) && (format < COMPRESSED_DXT3_RGBA)) dataSize = 8;
4663  else if ((format >= COMPRESSED_DXT3_RGBA) && (format < COMPRESSED_ASTC_8x8_RGBA)) dataSize = 16;
4664  }
4665 
4666  return dataSize;
4667 }
4668 #endif // RLGL_STANDALONE
4669 
4670 #endif // RLGL_IMPLEMENTATION
